111.content:
The settlement appeared to be a futuristic metropolis of some kind with skyscrapers that appeared to be hovering over the ground and light up highways. Every vehicle appeared to hover a foot or two off the ground and all of them were brightly colored and some even were covered in graffiti. The city was not without the occasional tree or other flora and there also appeared to be small gardens protected by electrified fences and forcefields of some sort. It would appear that the anthros reached up to 7 feet tall and there were anthros everywhere you looked.

You pulled up your head because you had no idea what these anthros were like or how they would react to a human. For all you knew, these anthros could be hostile. You even have to duck and hide as a couple of anthro police come forward. Both of them were heavily armored and looked like they were carrying laser pistols and electric handcuffs. One of the police resembled an anthropomorphic star-nosed mole man with a cap on his head that looked like it had digital parts attached to it. The other one resembled an anthropomorphic gaur man with bright blue fur, long horns and what looked like a goatee. Unlike his partner, he appeared to be wearing mechanical goggles. While the stars on their chests signified that these animals were the police, you’d rather not risk it and just run down the street.

You could see that the sidewalks have glowing lights on them and you even see a three-dimension television screen on a large skyscraper that appeared to depict an ocelot woman on the news that from the looks of it, had large F-cup breasts that were completely bear, though she was still wearing a coat and news outfit. You couldn’t believe it. You were in some sort of anthro animal metropolis and also from the looks of it they were even more advanced technology-wise than your garden variety human being.

You eventually walk up to what looks like some form of levitating bus stop and sit down as you survey the area. The skyscrapers were glowing and you saw that they came in multiple colors. Some of them were even painted in patterns and graffiti-like designs. You didn’t even think graffiti artists could reach that far. Obviously this city was a center of technology, culture and art. From the looks of it, there were anthropomorphic animals of mammals, reptiles, birds and even some animals that were supposed to be mythological. It was amazing.

That was when you say what looked like an anthro who was approaching the bench you were sitting at. From the looks of it, it was a female anthro. You were about to find out what kind she was.

Looking at the big sword that he has, you nodded your head as the draft horse turns and you follow him. The crowd around you grows as more and more furries appeared in the narrow streets. The crowd keeps a space around you, allowing you to walk freely. You keep walking for a while, look at your surroundings.

The Furries work and live the wooden buildings giving the impression that you are in a large medieval town. , but you soon see the large stone walls of the castle . You take a last look at the crowd of furries that are behind you, as you approached the castle walls. What's when you see..a human-like face...eyes,...nose. A human? Was that a human you saw?

Before you could look further, You and the Draft horse quickly walk through the castle gates' and enter the castle proper. You met a pair of guards.

"Inquisitor Valens reporting" The Draft horse says to the guards. "This...Hummie was spotted in town, and I taking him in for questioning. I will need to have used of the lower levels of the castle, and...WE do not wish to be disrupted."

The pair of guards, a tiger and a wolf look at you what seem like...pity.

114211111.title: North

1143.content:
That temple up ahead had you curious. From the looks of it it was very important, given the large paintings of strange anthro figures on the sides. However, you didn’t know whether or not these anthro amazons were friendly or hostile. So, you get on all fours and run as fast as you can to avoid being seen, along the way, you slid under the skirt of a gigantic crocodile woman and get a good look at her privates that makes your nose bleed. However, you rub it off and then you slide to the side just as a heavyset koala woman walks past you, at one point whacking you in the face with her massive reach.
 Once you recover from the koala booty you see that you had a nosebleed that got blood on the koala woman’s left buttocks. But you shake off that feeling and quickly hide from the anthros that might see you. The guards outside the temple you see consist of an Amazonian jackal woman with pitch black fur and a golden chainmail bikini and an Amazonian hawk woman with red hair, gold feathers and a silver chainmail bikini. Both very pear-shaped.

They look vigilante and pretty irritable, so you have to find some way to get past them. You see a giant rock and then toss it to the side. The hawk woman senses the motion first and then speaks in anthro language to the jackal woman. Both of them stomp off to investigate and you slide under both their sets of legs into the temple.
 The temple was slightly dark and there were strange paintings on the wall that looked like some sort of tapestry. They were mainly of anthro amazons, but there was one painting that looked like it had several human men as well. Then you hear yelling in anthro language and turn your head in surprise.

As it turns out, this village appeared to be run in a Triumverate of sorts. Three female chiefs. The chief in the center yellow seat was a golden furred and pear-shaped lioness with golden brown hair in a green chestplate with African style tribal markings on her face that almost looked like a skull. In the white seat to the left, there was a massive white furred and pear-shaped Holstein cow woman with huge H-cup breasts and an udder to match. She had a pierced nose with blond hair, large silver horns and a tiara of sorts. The last of the chiefs in the right blue seat was a large pear-shaped and blue feathered flamingo woman with strawberry colored hair and what looked like a pair of primitive looking bifocals. She also wore a toga like some kind of Roman goddess.

All three chiefs look at you and then surprisingly, one of them speaks to you. In English. Which one?
1143.title: The Three Chiefs

choices: Queen Elanor leads you to a small chamber
11433.content:
"Why you come to our land Human?" Asked the Blue Flamingo

"You can talk?" You exclaim surprised

The Flamingo nods "As the oldest Chief by 30 years I have had time to study the Human Language, I can speak with you...The other two chiefs can only understand you...The Commoners can do neither. I ask again, Why did you come here?"

"I don't know." You say "I was just curious."

"Humans have not come to our village in over five thousand years." Said the Flamingo "When the last Human visited the Pyramids were still new...You have been very bad sneaking into our village uninvited."

"Look I'll leave if that's what you want!" You say

"Hold." Said the Flamingo "You may be of some use to us, 10 years ago a mysterious illness killed all our males, we fear we will be doomed to extinction if something is not done."

"Are you saying what I think you're saying?" You ask

"That depends." Said the Flamingo "If you wish to help repopulate us...You will have to prove you are worthy of breeding, we want strong males with strong genes."

"Oh...I'm sure I am strong enough." You say

"You past pass a test." The Flamingo said "I test that I, Queen Elanor, developed."
11433.title: The Blue Flamingo

choices: A tall fox in a fine chest bearing dress.
A skunk stepping out of a nearby factory wearing a toolbelt and nothing else.
A dog sitting in an alleyway.
115.content:
You hear the sound of distant pistons and hissing steam, above you the air is filled with clouds of steam and around you in the air is warm and a bit muggy. The buildings around are all slick with moisture and resemble Victorian architecture though a bit more stylized like what you might find in a painting. The clothing is much the same, stylized Victorian fashion though much, much skimpier than anything actually worn during that time. Presumably because of the warmth all of the clothing to the women were wearing covers very little frequently leaving their chests and/or assess bare. Some women were walking around naked with no one so much as batting an eye.

You were amazed by the collection of impossibly beautiful scantily clad women in the city before you but one woman in particular drew your attention above the rest...
115.title: a city of Stream and industry.

1153.content:
You hear a steam engine chugging past in the distance and then a steam whistle for work letting out as you near a blonde canine lady wearing just an engineering cap and dusty brown trousers. Her head snaps up and her ears go back as she sniffs and then turns her head to look at you. "Crikey! It's me lucky day! A bloody hoo-mun walks right up ta me!" She slowly gets to her feet. She's about the same height as you and is smiling.

"Now now... Easy does it," she says stalking closer toward you making no sudden moves. "Just relax, Liza ain't gonna hurt ya none," she promises.
1153.title: A dog sitting in an alleyway.

choices: Tell her you know where more hoo-mons are she should let you go
11532.content:
"Hey, Liza. Nice to meet you. What is this place?" You ask. She gets close and at the last possible second tackles you to the dirty tarmek and hog ties you with your own belt. "Hoo hoo hoo! I'm a gonna be RICH I am! I'll eat at the fanciest of places and rub elbows with the upper crust! 'Tis my lucky luck day!" She begins rummaging through your pockets and comes across your cell phone.

"Blimey! It's like a futuristic lookin' glass ain't it?!" She cheers as your cell phone shows her what time it is. She thinks she's gonna get rich and famous off of you just like you thought you'd get rich and famous. Better do something fast.
11532.title: Try to reason with liza

choices: Yes I'll show you all I know
I don't know how cell phones work
115322.content:
"You're a biggun ya are... I'm gonna let your feet loose, no funny business or I'll give ya what for!" She warned. Taking her own belt off, she cinches it around your neck with a strong tug to check for tightness. It makes you gag before she lets you up.

"You're a right proper specimen though, those last blokes that came thisaway were a far cry from tame I tell you!" She tugs the belt around your throat again cutting off your air for a second at the buckle gets too tight against your Adams apple.

"Hey, I'm new here... Not so hard," you ask. She takes your hair in her strong three fingered hand and pls your face around to kiss you... Or lick your face... Either way her big canine tongue went into your mouth and tasted your eyes... Everything.

"A far cry indeed," Liza says under her breath. "Will you teach me how your human tricks work?" She insists jiggling your keys in front of your face.
115322.title: Wait and see

info.brief_description: You wander into an underground city that is populated by Furries.
info.description:
You discover a cave and decided to take a look. It seems to go on forever until you see an underground city, which is populated by furries!

1. The main character is male

2. The females in this story will have VERY HOT bodies! (Huge breasts, thin waists, big asses, wide hips etc.) And will be five to seven feet tall, OK?!

3. This story will have romance, sex and other mature content, furries, love and anything else you come up with

4. Try to add long chapters (a paragraph at least)

5. No offense, but no gay sex

6. NO VORE!

7. Enjoy!


Reward: 1000 gps per chapter
